TextBlock.Text: STATUS: This facility is a Nomai anomaly research station in orbit around planetary body: <color=orange>Emerald Reverie</color>. Primary star: <color=orange>Verdant Beacon</color>.
STATUS: Elevator system offline. Residual power routed to anomaly containment systems. Full power required to open doors.
REQUIREMENT: Four anomaly keys required to unlock elevator access to lower chamber. Key insertion slots detected adjacent to terminal.
DIRECTORY: Four anomaly chambers registered in ring corridor. Descriptions follow:

- Chamber where sound loops back unnaturally
- Chamber containing crystals that bend light
- Chamber with symbols that respond to observer position
- Chamber where movement is replayed by a phantom double
